message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the physical properties of a quartz crystal. A quartz crystal is transparent, meaning light can pass through it without being scattered. Option (A) is incorrect because a quartz crystal does not produce magic. Option (B) is incorrect because a quartz crystal is not a power source. Option (C) is incorrect because a quartz crystal is not a deodorant. Option (D) is correct because a quartz crystal commonly has a hexagonal shape with six sides.
